00022 #region Usings

00024 using System.Drawing;
00025 using System.Drawing.Drawing2D;
00026 using System.Collections.Generic;
00027 using System.Drawing.Imaging;
00028 #endregion

00030 namespace Utilities.Media
00031 {
00035     public class Filter
00036     {
00037         #region Constructor
00038 
00039 
00040 
00041         public Filter()
00042         {
00043             _MyFilter = new int[3, 3];
00044         }
00045 
00051         public Filter(int Width, int Height)
00052         {
00053             _MyFilter = new int[Width, Height];
00054             this.Width = Width;
00055             this.Height = Height;
00056         }
00057         #endregion
00058 
00059         #region Public Properties
00060         private int[,] _MyFilter = null;
00061         private int _Width = 3;
00062         private int _Height = 3;
00063         private int _Offset = 0;
00064 
00068         public int[,] MyFilter
00069         {
00070             get { return _MyFilter; }
00071             set { _MyFilter = value; }
00072         }
00076         public int Width
00077         {
00078             get { return _Width; }
00079             set { _Width = value; }
00080         }
00084         public int Height
00085         {
00086             get { return _Height; }
00087             set { _Height = value; }
00088         }
00092         public int Offset
00093         {
00094             get { return _Offset; }
00095             set { _Offset = value; }
00096         }
00097         #endregion
00098 
00099         #region Public Functions
00100         public Bitmap ApplyFilter(Bitmap Input)
00101         {
00102             System.Drawing.Bitmap TempBitmap = Input;
00103             System.Drawing.Bitmap NewBitmap = new System.Drawing.Bitmap(TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height);
00104             System.Drawing.Graphics NewGraphics = System.Drawing.Graphics.FromImage(NewBitmap);
00105             NewGraphics.DrawImage(TempBitmap, new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height), new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height), System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit.Pixel);
00106             NewGraphics.Dispose();
00107             for (int x = 0; x < Input.Width; ++x)
00108             {
00109                 for (int y = 0; y < Input.Height; ++y)
00110                 {
00111                     int RValue = 0;
00112                     int GValue = 0;
00113                     int BValue = 0;
00114                     int Weight = 0;
00115                     int XCurrent = -Width / 2;
00116                     for (int x2 = 0; x2 < Width; ++x2)
00117                     {
00118                         if (XCurrent + x < Input.Width && XCurrent + x >= 0)
00119                         {
00120                             int YCurrent = -Height / 2;
00121                             for (int y2 = 0; y2 < Height; ++y2)
00122                             {
00123                                 if (YCurrent + y < Input.Height && YCurrent + y >= 0)
00124                                 {
00125                                     RValue += MyFilter[x2, y2] * TempBitmap.GetPixel(XCurrent + x, YCurrent + y).R;
00126                                     GValue += MyFilter[x2, y2] * TempBitmap.GetPixel(XCurrent + x, YCurrent + y).G;
00127                                     BValue += MyFilter[x2, y2] * TempBitmap.GetPixel(XCurrent + x, YCurrent + y).B;
00128                                     Weight += MyFilter[x2, y2];
00129                                 }
00130                                 ++YCurrent;
00131                             }
00132                         }
00133                         ++XCurrent;
00134                     }
00135                     Color MeanPixel = TempBitmap.GetPixel(x, y);
00136                     if (Weight == 0)
00137                         Weight = 1;
00138                     if (Weight > 0)
00139                     {
00140                         RValue = (RValue / Weight)+Offset;
00141                         if (RValue < 0)
00142                             RValue = 0;
00143                         else if (RValue > 255)
00144                             RValue = 255;
00145                         GValue = (GValue / Weight) + Offset;
00146                         if (GValue < 0)
00147                             GValue = 0;
00148                         else if (GValue > 255)
00149                             GValue = 255;
00150                         BValue = (BValue / Weight) + Offset;
00151                         if (BValue < 0)
00152                             BValue = 0;
00153                         else if (BValue > 255)
00154                             BValue = 255;
00155                         MeanPixel = Color.FromArgb(RValue, GValue, BValue);
00156                     }
00157                     NewBitmap.SetPixel(x, y, MeanPixel);
00158                 }
00159             }
00160             return NewBitmap;
00161         }
00162         #endregion
00163     }
